string.text: The flash of a bandit from the plant
The flash of a dead novice
The flash of a dead stalker
Seryi flash
Tolik Flash

Trader: A strange case, which contains the report of one of the military expeditions to the center of the Zone, has been delivered to the armypost... It is \nguarded as if it were filled with plutonium. But at nights there are only one or two guardsmen left. Sneak there utterly quietly and snatch that case for me.

Wolf: yesterday, several men came here from "Mercenaries" grouping... Came and pressured at full scale, like, you have one day term to leave the camp... 
Like, now it is their territory... Today, them may come again. The plan is as follows... The most obvious stalker wannabes will be sent to houses-basements 
with an order not to poke out of there... Or they'll perish as they've never existed... And we together with another couple of guys, who are more serious and 
beefy, will occupy good sectors to provide shooting on the zone around the campfire. We'll let them near the fire and with my command will strike from all 
sides... They'll come from the direction of bridge... So, look for a proper cover with the sight on the campfire and stand by for my command...
OK. I meet Ghoust's man. I wait him in the cache of Gunslinger. If he isn't stranger, he knows where to find me. Doctor
One guy went to scout the abandoned windmill and we have heard nothing about him since then. We'd better go and find out, where he disappeared.

Wolf: I was waiting for the box with dynamites, but obviously it won't reach me over those bandits. Bring it to me - I'll pay you. But you won't be able to cope \nthere alone. Near the factory, under the bridge my scouts are looking for those bastards. Pop in and tell them, that I've sent you as the reinforcement for them \nto assault the factory. If they don't believe you - tell them my "regards from hell". This is the password.

Trader: bandits have settled at the factory nearby. They harass stalkers who fetch artifacts to me, so as you can see it prevents my trading. And not only \nmine. Some buds at the camp are not satisfied with the situation. So, we can unite our forces to clear the Cordon from those scumbags.
Kill the Gunslinger.

Trader: one stalker has returned from a deep raid inside the Zone, his name is Fox. He says, that he's wounded and brought mutants on his tail. Help him, he \nseems to know something about Gunslinger, besides mutual aid is customary here.

Fox: O, by the way, Grey, mo brother, is waiting for me at hangar at the Garbage, I'll copy coordinates to you, you should talk to him. He knows more on you \nquestions. Besides, be very careful - several bandits have put down roots there.

Trader: those lads, removed by the copter, were spying upon the militaries for me. And to all appearances, the combatants have found something in the 
building of the former Agroprom Research Institute. I'm sure, that it's somehow connected with the center of the Zone. So, everything that has been found by 
the militaries is guarded somewhere on the second floor of the Institute. And we really need it. The matter concerns to all appearances the small white sack-
bag. If you manage to obtain the sack-bag, take it to Barman. He's in charge for all the stuff in stalker's bar "100 Roentgen", which is situated within the 
territory of former Rostok plant.

Restricted. To: Leader, “THRUTH” project 
KGB colonel V.Ì. Kruchelnikov 
From: Commander, «Search-2» group, 
captain D.F. Maksimenko 
 
 Report. 
 
Our group consisting of 3 investigators and the SBU SWAT unit from 12.05.2012 till 25.05.2012 has been inspecting the blocks of the former agricultural 
scientific and research institute on the contaminated lands of the scientific and research institute “Agroprom”. Most of the equipment and papers are lost or 
missing but the few evidences found allow us to make the following conclusion: the institute was not conducting the scientific researches in the field of 
agriculture from 2005 till 2008. The results of its “work” reported to the Ministry of Agriculture were trumped up. Equipment, consumables and financing 
assigned for the state programs were at the same time passed by the institute direction in the person of its head Petr Danilovich Strizh by forged invoices to 
some X-18 lab to carry out experiments in the secondary household of the institute. A group of persons involved in this case are likely to use some code name 
because there's no lab with such number database. According to the documents found we can assume that it lies at one hour driving distance from 
“Agroprom” institute. We suppose it to be a highly secret lab and that's why I require our analytic department to take part in its search. There's no possibility to 
clarify what this lab was actually engaged in relying on the information available. The found documents mention the notorious professor Chubko and some 
Group. I'm deeply convinced that this time we have got the end of the thread and the analytic department will start working on it. There's an archived file in the 
attachment containing invoices on equipment and consumables for some secondary household of the institute and a passage from Strizh and Chubko 
correspondence. Captain D.F. Maksimenko 26.05.2012 Prof. V.M. Chubko. From Dr. of Agriculture P.D. Strizh Head the scientific and research institute 
Agroprom. Dear Vadim Michailovich, as agreed upon send you a regular lot of equipment and consumables for you experimental household so that you can 
proceed with your highly important for agricultural sphere researches. These experiments are financing as the natural experiments in the field of our institute, 
so the will be no problems with the Ministry. So how are the tests going on? I'm still impressed by what you've shown me last time. Yours sincerely, P.D. 
Strizh. Dr. of Agriculture P.D. Strizh. Thanks a lot, Petr Danilovich, we've got the delivery. My guys are frantic about the laser spectrometer and if not but you I 
would have procured this model through my channels for ages. As to the Ministry of Agriculture it will be glad to get OUR results...you've made me, the old 
man, to laugh heartily. The experiments take it normal course and what you've seen last time is nothing in comparison with our present achievements. Come to 
visit us more often - we are always glad to see you. Especially that it takes only one hour to get to our “experimental household”, as you name it, by car. 
Almost forgotten, I have a news for you - next Monday I discuss you candidacy with the Group. I'm sure they will support me. Yours sincerely, Prof. 
V.M.Chubko. Prof. V.M.Chubko. From Dr. of Agriculture Head of scientific and research institute Agroprom P.D. Strizh. Vadim Michailovich, thanks for trusting 
us. I'm deeply touched and will do my best to justify it. I'm sure that each scientist is looking forward to take part in such an experiment and I will be very happy 
to become part of the Group. Yours sincerely, P.D. Strizh. P.S. I have managed to secure two brand new Japanese broadband oscillographs in the Ministry 
and will handle them to you as soon as an opportunity occurs.

Listen, Fox, there is one business here. Bull asked me to meet Mole. He's said to have dug something interesting about the Gunslinger. Remember that fella? \nSo, if you consider it interesting, get to me. I'll be in the hangar at the Garbage.
Trader: here is a field of "Mincer" anomalies. Artifact is in its center. The coordinates of the place are sent to your PDA along wih the information on the Mincer \nand its artifacts.
There is some strange anomaly. It looks like she moves. I'll try to calculate its trajectory and time of displacement, because I got no \nmoney to pay solders for bridge passage.
I've left a small cache at the abandoned farm. There is a lot of food, bullets. I couldn't carry them, my powers are weakening. I'm not sure, if I can get to the \ncamp.

Trader: my messengers are coming back from the raid. I don't want to see them here - they may have brought somebody on the tail. They were chasing the \nmilitaries, so it's not the best idea to shelter them here... So go to the cabin near the road... They will be waiting for you there... Take the flash-drive and return \nto me at once.
